titleStmt.title: A persvvasive to a mutuall compliance under the present government. Together with a plea for a free state compared with monarchy.
titleStmt.author: Osborne, Francis, 1593-1659.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: The "2" in the imprint date is crossed out and "1651" written in; "Febr. 18".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
